mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, DATE_FORMAT(CREA_DTM, '%y.%m.%d') CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, now(), #{CREA_ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = COALESCE(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, DATE_FORMAT(CREA_DTM, '%y.%m.%d %h:%i') CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS RESULT FROM report WHERE rp_id = #{ID} and rp_idx = #{IDX} and rp_type = #{TYPE}
